purpose.body: These Terms aim to define the rights, obligations, responsibilities, and other necessary matters between the Company and Members regarding the use of the SNS/community-based service (including mobile/web, hereinafter "Service") provided by "ARA" (hereinafter "Company").

definition.member: "Member" refers to a person who agrees to the Company's terms and creates an account to use the Service.
definition.content: "Content" means all materials including text, images, audio, video, links, and other data that Members upload, transmit, or post on the Service.
definition.paid_service: "Paid Service" refers to services that require payment, such as digital items, subscriptions, ad removal, and additional storage.

contract.h: Article 3 (Establishment and Qualification of Use Agreement)
contract.agreement: The use agreement is established when a Member agrees to the terms and privacy policy and completes the registration process.
contract.verification: Identity verification procedures, including social login, may be required.
contract.age_limit: Persons under 14 years of age cannot register. The Company may request submission of age verification documents when necessary.

community.guidelines: You must comply with laws, regulations, terms, and community guidelines.
community.prohibited_content: It is prohibited to post, transmit, or promote content that infringes on the rights of others or is illegal, harmful, discriminatory, hateful, obscene, or violent.
community.prohibited_actions: It is prohibited to collect or post personal information (yours or others') without authorization, spam, advertising, phishing, lending/transferring accounts, or accessing/collecting/scraping using automated means.
community.violations: The Company may delete posts, restrict exposure, temporarily suspend, or permanently ban accounts in case of guideline violations.

member_duty.password: Members are responsible for managing their account passwords.
member_duty.identity: You must not misappropriate another person's identity or payment method, or register false information.
member_duty.ai_output: You must not use AI function outputs within the Service in a manner that infringes on third-party rights.

license.copyright: The copyright of content posted by Members belongs to the Member in principle.
license.grant: Members grant the Company a non-exclusive, free, worldwide license to store, reproduce, post, display, transmit, and edit (limited to format changes) such content for the purpose of providing, operating, improving, and promoting the Service. Members may revoke this license after deleting the post or account (excluding retention for backup/legal compliance purposes).
license.responsibility: Members are solely responsible for all legal consequences if they post content that infringes on others' rights.

ai.usage: The Service may use AI/algorithm functions such as post recommendation, content generation/summarization, and report review assistance.
ai.disclaimer: AI results may contain errors and are provided for reference purposes. Members should review and utilize the results themselves.

payment.pricing: The price, payment terms, and refund policy for paid services are separately notified on the screen.
payment.policy: App market/payment agency policies may apply first.

service_change.body: The Company may change or suspend all or part of the Service when operationally or technically necessary or when laws/policies change, and important changes will be announced in advance.

termination.withdrawal: Members may withdraw from the settings at any time.
termination.restriction: If there are reasons such as violation of terms/guidelines, multiple infringement reports, or security threats, the Company may delete posts, restrict exposure, or suspend/terminate accounts after prior notice (post-notice in emergencies).

ip_report.takedown: If a rights holder demonstrates infringement, the Company may temporarily block or delete the relevant content.
ip_report.counter: Posters may request reinstatement by submitting counter-evidence.

disclaimer.force_majeure: The Company is not liable for damages caused by force majeure such as natural disasters or communication failures.
disclaimer.disputes: Disputes between Members or between Members and third parties are the responsibility of the parties, and the Company is not liable unless there is willful misconduct or gross negligence.

law.body: These Terms are governed by the laws of the Republic of Korea, and in case of disputes, the court having jurisdiction over the Company's principal office shall have exclusive jurisdiction.

notice.body: The Company may amend the terms within the scope of compliance with relevant laws, and will announce the amended content and effective date at least 7 days in advance (30 days for changes disadvantageous to Members).

collect.optional_items: Date of birth, gender, profile picture, country/language, self-introduction
collect.auto_items: Access/usage logs, IP/device information, cookies/similar technologies, error/crash logs, notification tokens, advertising identifiers (when opted in)
collect.social_items: Information within the provider's policy scope, such as profile nickname/email and platform identifiers

purpose.sns_features: Providing core SNS features such as friend recommendations and feed exposure
purpose.support: Customer inquiry response and announcements, service stabilization and quality improvement
purpose.analytics: Statistics/analysis and personalized content recommendations (within consent scope)

share.h: Article 3 (Third-Party Provision and Processing of Personal Information)
share.principle: The Company does not provide personal information to third parties without the Member's consent in principle.
share.outsourcing: For service operation, tasks such as cloud/data hosting, log analysis, and message delivery may be outsourced to specialized vendors. The names, tasks, and retention periods of trustees are disclosed on the 'Trustees' disclosure page within the service.
share.legal: Information may be provided exceptionally when requested by law.

xborder.body: The server location or trustee's facilities may be located abroad. The country of transfer, transfer date and method, retention period, and protective measures are disclosed within the service.

store.withdrawal: Personal information is destroyed without delay upon member withdrawal, but may be retained for a certain period according to relevant laws.
store.legal_retention: E-commerce/payment and telecommunications fact confirmation data follow legal retention periods.
store.backup: If immediate deletion is difficult due to technical limitations of the backup system, it will be stored separately and periodically destroyed.

security.encryption: Encrypted storage of passwords and sensitive information
security.access_control: Minimization of access rights and regular inspections
security.logs: Access record retention and prevention of forgery/alteration
security.backup_recovery: Operating backup/disaster recovery systems in preparation for security incidents

rights.h: Article 7 (Rights of Users and Legal Representatives)
rights.data_rights: You may request access, correction, deletion, suspension of processing, and data portability of personal information.
rights.settings: You can change profile publicity scope and notification/personalized recommendation settings.
rights.cookies: Cookie settings can be managed in your browser.

children.body: Registration of children under 14 years of age is not permitted, and accounts may be restricted upon confirmation.

notice.body: This policy may be amended in accordance with changes in laws/services, and important changes will be announced 7 days in advance (30 days for changes disadvantageous to Members).

channels.settings: You can change this in Settings > Notifications/Marketing menu or the link at the bottom of received messages.
channels.apply: Withdrawal will be applied from subsequent mailings.

partners.body: Some mailing tasks may be outsourced to professional agencies, and partner marketing will be conducted with separate consent.

note.body: Essential service operation notices (terms/security, etc.) may be sent regardless of reception consent.
